tool.name: Movie Maker Basic
tool.description: produces a basic pymol session for the creation of a protein ligand interaction movie with PyMol

tool.help:
This tool creates a PyMol session, which can be used to produce a movie with PyMol.
**Input Parameter**
Following parameters should be entered to allow a flawless computation:
pdb-file three letter code of ligand chain of the binding pocket in question
Example: 1r4l.pdb XX5 A
**Output**
The pymol session (\*.pse) can be downloaded as pse file and loaded with pymol.
**DEBUGGING** If there is no molecule present make sure you defined the correct ligand residue name, this script will already try to guess the chain identifier
